name: malaprop
content:

a
malapropism : On the campaign trail, he has been prone to the occasional malaprop or misstatement.
More examplesFewer examplesShe is always on hand to correct his malaprops.Real feeling can sometimes sneak out in a malaprop or verbal slip.Refreshingly plainspoken one minute, he can deploy a stream of clumsy malaprops the next.The title, Include Me Out, is taken from a Goldwyn malaprop uttered when he was passing on a project.
